title: Organic Daily Detox Smoothie Powder · Ocean's Balance
description: Cleanse with 100% superfood! Our Daily Detox Smoothie Powder is full of healthy foods loaded with antioxidants. And so easy to use: Just blend 1 Tbsp Smoothie Powder with 2 bananas and 1 cup orange juice to enjoy all of the cleansing properties of these clean, tasty ingredients. The mild flavor of the Spirulina blend
cleaned_text: We do our best to get orders to you as quickly as possible! While, Heritage Seaweed can't guarantee actual delivery time, here's what to expect with a typical order's journey: : Within 1-2 days after placing order, excluding days we're closed. : Within 0-1 day after packing is complete, excluding Sundays. : USPS is responsible for ensuring transit times based on rate purchased.
